cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.DS 

Reasoning: The paper focuses on structured prediction, which is a common problem in machine learning and falls under the category of supervised learning. The use of structured SVM and surrogate losses suggests that the paper is likely to be related to the subfield of machine learning known as structured prediction, which is a subfield of both artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The mention of hierarchical classification and label structure suggests that the paper may also be related to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the mention of regularization suggests that the paper may also be related to the subfield of optimization and algorithms (cs.DS).
